data.comment: The match is underway at BC Place.
Ted Unkel signals a Portland throw-in in Vancouver's half.
In the minute 2, In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Throw-in for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
Can Portland capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 5, Goal! Felipe Mora heads Portland into a 0-1 lead.
Eryk Williamson instrumental with a fine assist.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Portland territory.
In the minute 7, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
Vancouver apply pressure and a brilliant heading opportunity is created for Andy Rose but the ball hits the post!
Goal kick for Portland at BC Place.
In the minute 8, Free kick for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
Cristian Gutierrez (Vancouver) has received a yellow card from Ted Unkel.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marco Farfan is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
In the minute 15, Marco Farfan for Portland is back on the field again.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Eryk Williamson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Portland.
In the minute 18, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Ball safe as Vancouver is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 22, Vancouver's Fredy Montero gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Portland defender.
Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Vancouver in Vancouver.
In the minute 24, Ted Unkel awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in Portland.
The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Marco Farfan.
In the minute 27, Portland's Marco Farfan looks ok and returns to the pitch.
Throw-in for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
Vancouver surge into the attack at BC Place but Lucas Cavalliniâ€™s header is off-target.
In the minute 27, Ball goes out of play for a Portland goal kick.
Portland have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Portland at BC Place.
In the minute 30, Ted Unkel awards Vancouver a goal kick.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Corner awarded to Portland.
In the minute 33, Important block from the Vancouver defence as Marco Farfan fires in a strike for Portland.
Corner awarded to Portland.
Ted Unkel signals a throw-in for Portland, close to Vancouver's area.
In the minute 34, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
Free kick for Portland in their own half.
Portland are coming forward and Pablo Bonilla gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 39, Portland needs to be cautious. Vancouver have an attacking throw-in.
Vancouver's Fredy Montero goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Lucas Cavallini for Vancouver has been booked by Ted Unkel and receives a first yellow card.
In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Ted Unkel awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 43, It's a goal kick for the away team in Vancouver.
Vancouver have a goal kick.
Portland awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 45, 3 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Free kick Portland.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Portland is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver.
In the minute 45, Free kick for Portland in their own half.
The first-half is over at BC Place.
Janio Bikel (Vancouver) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Marco Farfan (Portland) has received a first yellow card.
The second-half has just kicked-off.
In the minute 46, Free kick for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
The away team have replaced Eryk Williamson with Diego Valeri. This is the first substitution made today by Giovanni Savarese.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 49, In Vancouver a free kick has been awarded the home team.
At BC Place, Cristhian Paredes has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Free kick for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
In the minute 52, Vancouver are pushing forward but Lucas Cavallini's finish is wide of the goal.
Ted Unkel awards Portland a goal kick.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
In the minute 55, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Portland's half?
Throw-in for Portland in their own half.
In the minute 56, Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Portland in their own half.
Portland to take a throw-in in Vancouver territory.
In the minute 58, Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
The away team replace Marvin Loria with Yimmi Chara.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Portland.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
In the minute 63, Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Cristian Gutierrez for Vancouver who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
David Milinkovic (Vancouver) has replaced the possibly injured Cristian Gutierrez.
In the minute 66, Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ted Unkel signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Goal kick for Vancouver at BC Place.
In the minute 68, Throw-in Vancouver.
Andy Polo of Portland smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Ted Unkel signals a Vancouver throw-in in Portland's half.
In the minute 72, Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Portland's half?
It's a goal kick for the home team in Vancouver.
Ted Unkel awards Portland a goal kick.
In the minute 76, Giovanni Savarese (Portland) is making a third substitution, with Jaroslaw Niezgoda replacing Felipe Mora.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Portland.
Giovanni Savarese is making the team's fourth substitution at BC Place with Jeremy Ebobisse replacing Cristhian Paredes.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Portland in the half of Vancouver.
In Vancouver Portland attack through Yimmi Chara. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
In the minute 82, Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Throw-in for Portland at BC Place.
Free kick Vancouver.
In the minute 83, Portland awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Can Portland capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Vancouver's half?
In the minute 85, Portland push forward at BC Place and Jeremy Ebobisse gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Vancouver defence.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Jeremy Ebobisse (Portland) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In the minute 86, In Vancouver Portland drive forward through Jeremy Ebobisse. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Yimmi Chara for Portland drives towards goal at BC Place. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Portland.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Corner awarded to Vancouver.
Portland's Diego Valeri gets in a shot on goal at BC Place. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Portland have been awarded a corner by Ted Unkel.
Portland have a dangerous throw-in.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-1.
Tosaint Ricketts is on a sub for Jake Nerwinski for Vancouver.
Ryan Raposo is replacing Cristian Dajome for the home team.
